alert.note: Alert for Shoshone, Lava Beds; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Blaine and eastern Lincoln Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Gannett to 11 miles southeast of Richfield. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carey, Little Wood Reservoir, Picabo, Richfield and Gannett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Shoshone, Lava Beds; Wood River Foothills
